name: marketputer
description: Orchestrator agent that coordinates and pays multiple specialized agents using x402 micropayments

scripts.autonomous: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json
scripts.x402: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json
scripts.solana: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json
scripts.trending: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json
scripts.memeputer: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json
scripts.payai: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/payai.json
scripts.loop-payai: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/payai.json --loop
scripts.loop-memeputer: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json --loop
